all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore, strengthen your brethren in all your conversation, in all your prayers, in all your exhortations, and in all your doings.
Doctrine and Covenants 108:7
Quote of the Day
"Our faith must be centered in Christ and our hope in His blessings, as He chooses to send them."
Elder Sandino Roman | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
